Baldonnell Bus Park
Balldonnell

partnerDetails.about:
We specialize in the bespoke system design, installation, commissioning & support for the following automation & control systems:

  • ECSNet : Electrical Control Systems i.e. MV & LV Network Automation
  • PlantNet : Process Control Systems i.e. General Process, Telemetry & OEM Machine Control
  • MillNet : Feedmill Systems i.e. Process Control of Feedmill with complex Routing Control.
  • BlendNet : Blending Systems i.e. Process Control of Blending & Batching.
  • TerminalNet : Terminal Automation, i.e. Process Control & Automation for Petrochemical Fuel Depots
  • EMSNet : Energy Measurement Systems i.e. MV & LV Network Energy Measurement & Power Quality Analysis

We use the following validation process for larger projects: URS, FDS, FAT, SFAT, SAT, OEM Manuals, User Manuals, Training Manuals. Engineer Reports are created for support and miscellaneous work.

ControlNet are integrators of Schneider Electric Modicon / Telemecanique /SoMachine PLC/PAC and automation product range.
